title: Why did the DOT decide to just patch all of the many potholes on Front St. just past the Burnett intersection going towards downtown from Monkey Junction? After these latest rains/flooding the road that was poor to begin with was left with many small potholes. Instead of just repaving it they just filled them all in. Now it looks like a long checker board. Why did they waste the money on a temporary fix when even a blind man can see what solution is needed to the problem?
